RitualOutcomeEffectDef.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.

extraPredictedOutcomeDescriptions.li: Duelists and viewers will gain melee combat experience.
Spectators will gain a mood boost and fill their recreation bars.

li.label: Terrible
li.description: The duel was terrible! The fighters bumbled around, ineptly avoiding each other in a extended display of cowardice and weakness. Watching it just made people sad.

li.label: Boring
li.description: The duel was boring. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments.

li.label: Good
li.description: The duel was good. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart.

li.label: Unforgettable
li.description: The duel was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had, and the death showed their dedication.
